name: Untitled Space Dragon Game Prototype
description:
Untitled Space Dragon Game Prototype™: The Videogame You have been summoned to heal the cosmic home of space dragons. Explore a strange island floating in space, befriend a dragon, and bring everything back to life.

Third person 3D walking and flying with simple object interactions.

--

The concept for this game involves multiple islands and multiple dragons and a variety of cosmic powers, not to mention several ancient puzzles, but for now it is a stripped down prototype of just one island and one dragon and very simple interactions.

Expect many updates that expand and improve upon the existing gameplay ideas and atmosphere, taking your feedback into consideration, so please leave a comment.

--

Note: Xbox gamepads supported.

Primary Controls
  • WASD - look/move
  • E - interact with objects
  • ENTER - mount/dismount
  • ESC - toggle main menu
Bonus Controls
  • F1 - emergency reset
  • Q - use item in hand
  • C - call/summon
